name: View Compliance Record Detail
description: Back Office Users can click the View button (eye icon) to navigate to a detailed compliance record page showing contractor information and all requirement statuses in read-only mode.

background.text: I am logged in as admin
I am on the Compliance Dashboard list view

scenarios.name: Successfully navigate to compliance record detail page

steps.text: I see a compliance record in the list view
I click the View button (eye icon) for a compliance record
I should be navigated to the Compliance Record Detail page
the page header should display "Compliance Record Detail"
the page should be in read-only mode
I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
I should see the contractor's name displayed as "First Name Last Name"
I should see the overall compliance status with color-coded badge
all header information should be auto-populated from Focus system

scenarios.name: Display all requirements with correct status badges

steps.text: I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
I should see the Requirements section with "Requirement" and "Status" column headers
I should see all 30 requirement fields listed
each requirement should display either "Compliant" with green badge or "Non-Compliant" with red badge
all requirement fields should be read-only

scenarios.name: Display overall compliant status when all requirements are compliant

steps.text: I am viewing a compliance record where all requirements are compliant
the overall status should display "Compliant" with green badge
all individual requirements should show "Compliant" with green badges

scenarios.name: Display overall non-compliant status when any requirement is non-compliant

steps.text: I am viewing a compliance record where at least one requirement is non-compliant
the overall status should display "Non-Compliant" with red badge
I should see at least one requirement showing "Non-Compliant" with red badge

scenarios.name: Successfully navigate back to Compliance Dashboard

steps.text: I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
I click the back navigation button
I should be returned to the Compliance Dashboard list view
I should see the list of compliance records

scenarios.name: View button unavailable for invalid compliance record

steps.text: I attempt to access a compliance record detail page with invalid record ID
I should see an error message indicating the record cannot be found
I should not be able to view the compliance record details

scenarios.name: Page load fails with missing contractor data

steps.text: I access a compliance record with incomplete contractor data from Focus system
I should see an error message about missing contractor information
the page should handle the missing data gracefully

scenarios.name: Requirements section fails to load properly

steps.text: I am on a compliance record detail page where requirements data fails to load
I should see an error message about requirements data being unavailable
the header section should still display available contractor information

scenarios.name: Unauthorized access to compliance record detail

steps.text: I attempt to access a compliance record detail page without proper permissions
I should see an access denied error message
I should be redirected to an appropriate page

scenarios.name: Edge case - Compliance record with all requirements non-compliant

steps.text: I am viewing a compliance record where all 30 requirements are non-compliant
the overall status should display "Non-Compliant" with red badge
all 30 individual requirements should show "Non-Compliant" with red badges
the page should load and display properly despite all non-compliant statuses

scenarios.name: Edge case - Compliance record with mixed requirement statuses

steps.text: I am viewing a compliance record with a mix of compliant and non-compliant requirements
the overall status should display "Non-Compliant" with red badge
I should see some requirements with "Compliant" green badges
I should see some requirements with "Non-Compliant" red badges

scenarios.name: Page maintains read-only state for all interaction attempts

steps.text: I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
I attempt to interact with any field or requirement status
no fields should be editable or modifiable
all content should remain in read-only mode
no form submission should be possible

gherkin_content:
Feature: View Compliance Record Detail
  Back Office Users can click the View button (eye icon) to navigate to a detailed compliance record page showing contractor information and all requirement statuses in read-only mode.

  Background:
    Given I am on the application
    And I am logged in as admin
    And I am on the Compliance Dashboard list view

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Successfully navigate to compliance record detail page
    Given I see a compliance record in the list view
    When I click the View button (eye icon) for a compliance record
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Record Detail page
    And the page header should display "Compliance Record Detail"
    And the page should be in read-only mode

  @positive @data-display
  Scenario: Display contractor header information correctly
    Given I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
    Then I should see the contractor's name displayed as "First Name Last Name"
    And I should see the overall compliance status with color-coded badge
    And all header information should be auto-populated from Focus system

  @positive @data-display
  Scenario: Display all requirements with correct status badges
    Given I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
    Then I should see the Requirements section with "Requirement" and "Status" column headers
    And I should see all 30 requirement fields listed
    And each requirement should display either "Compliant" with green badge or "Non-Compliant" with red badge
    And all requirement fields should be read-only

  @positive @business-logic
  Scenario: Display overall compliant status when all requirements are compliant
    Given I am viewing a compliance record where all requirements are compliant
    Then the overall status should display "Compliant" with green badge
    And all individual requirements should show "Compliant" with green badges

  @positive @business-logic
  Scenario: Display overall non-compliant status when any requirement is non-compliant
    Given I am viewing a compliance record where at least one requirement is non-compliant
    Then the overall status should display "Non-Compliant" with red badge
    And I should see at least one requirement showing "Non-Compliant" with red badge

  @positive @navigation
  Scenario: Successfully navigate back to Compliance Dashboard
    Given I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
    When I click the back navigation button
    Then I should be returned to the Compliance Dashboard list view
    And I should see the list of compliance records

  @negative @error-handling
  Scenario: View button unavailable for invalid compliance record
    Given I attempt to access a compliance record detail page with invalid record ID
    Then I should see an error message indicating the record cannot be found
    And I should not be able to view the compliance record details

  @negative @error-handling
  Scenario: Page load fails with missing contractor data
    Given I access a compliance record with incomplete contractor data from Focus system
    Then I should see an error message about missing contractor information
    And the page should handle the missing data gracefully

  @negative @error-handling
  Scenario: Requirements section fails to load properly
    Given I am on a compliance record detail page where requirements data fails to load
    Then I should see an error message about requirements data being unavailable
    And the header section should still display available contractor information

  @negative @security
  Scenario: Unauthorized access to compliance record detail
    Given I attempt to access a compliance record detail page without proper permissions
    Then I should see an access denied error message
    And I should be redirected to an appropriate page

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Edge case - Compliance record with all requirements non-compliant
    Given I am viewing a compliance record where all 30 requirements are non-compliant
    Then the overall status should display "Non-Compliant" with red badge
    And all 30 individual requirements should show "Non-Compliant" with red badges
    And the page should load and display properly despite all non-compliant statuses

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Edge case - Compliance record with mixed requirement statuses
    Given I am viewing a compliance record with a mix of compliant and non-compliant requirements
    Then the overall status should display "Non-Compliant" with red badge
    And I should see some requirements with "Compliant" green badges
    And I should see some requirements with "Non-Compliant" red badges

  @edge-case @security
  Scenario: Page maintains read-only state for all interaction attempts
    Given I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
    When I attempt to interact with any field or requirement status
    Then no fields should be editable or modifiable
    And all content should remain in read-only mode
    And no form submission should be possible
